name: Pesto Pizza
description: Pizza with pesto sauce, mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, and arugula.
beer_pairing: KÃ¶lsch - Light and crisp, complements the fresh and herbal flavors of the pesto.

name: Mushroom & Onion Pizza
description: Pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh mushrooms, and caramelized onions.
beer_pairing: Amber Ale - Rich and malty, pairs well with the earthy flavors of mushrooms.

name: Mediterranean Pizza
description: Pizza with tomato sauce, feta cheese, black olives, cherry tomatoes, and fresh spinach.
beer_pairing: Wheat Beer - Light and refreshing, perfect with Mediterranean toppings.

name: Vegetarian Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and vegetarian pepperoni.
beer_pairing: IPA - Hoppy and bold, complements the spiciness of the vegetarian pepperoni.

name: Veggie Pizza
description: Pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, bell peppers, green olives, and artichokes.
beer_pairing: Pale Ale - Balanced and versatile, matches well with a variety of vegetable toppings.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: Pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, parmesan, ricotta, and gorgonzola cheeses.
beer_pairing: Blonde Ale - Smooth and slightly sweet, pairs well with the rich cheese flavors.

name: Spinach & Feta Pizza
description: Pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, feta cheese, and fresh spinach.
beer_pairing: Saison - A farmhouse ale that complements the tanginess of the feta.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza (Vegetarian)
description: Pizza with BBQ sauce, mozzarella, vegetarian chicken strips, and red onions.
beer_pairing: Brown Ale - Nutty and slightly sweet, pairs well with the smoky BBQ sauce.

name: Bianca Pizza
description: White pizza with mozzarella, ricotta, garlic, and fresh herbs.
beer_pairing: Sour Ale - Tart and refreshing, balances the creamy cheese.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.
beer_pairing: Pilsner - A light and crisp beer that complements the simple flavors.

name: Pale Ale
description: A refreshing pale ale with a crisp finish.

name: IPA
description: A hoppy and flavorful India Pale Ale. Strong.

name: Stout
description: A rich and creamy stout with notes of coffee.

name: Wheat Beer
description: A smooth wheat beer with hints of citrus.

name: Porter
description: A dark and flavorful porter with a chocolate finish.

name: Pilsner
description: A crisp and clean pilsner, perfect for hot days.

name: Amber Ale
description: A well-balanced amber ale with a hint of caramel.

name: Brown Ale
description: A smooth and nutty brown ale with a mild finish.

name: Saison
description: A fruity and spicy saison with a dry finish.

name: Double IPA
description: A double dose of hops and alcohol, not for the faint of heart.

description: Classic Italian pasta with a creamy sauce and pancetta.

name: Penne Arrabbiata
description: Penne pasta with a spicy tomato sauce.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Fettuccine noodles with a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce.
